casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Madeline GRIFFIN Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 7, 2018

Denise B. Smoker, senior assistant state's attorney, in support of the petition.

Pamela S. Nagy, assistant public defender, in opposition.

The state's cross petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 184 Conn. App. 595, 195 A.3d 723 (2018), is denied.
